# Tavern (Building)
## Overview
**Tavern**

**Create** 22 Goods, 1 Influence, 22 Labor (910 gp)

**Rooms** 1 [[Bar (Room)|Bar]], 1 [[Common Room (Room)|Common Room]], 1 [[Lavatory (Room)|Lavatory]], 1 [[Office (Room)|Office]], 1 [[Storage (Room)|Storage]]

An eating or drinking establishment.
